column4: hi again :) now I have chatzilla but it says it is connects to irc channels. how can i connect to a web based chat?
IRC is IRC. Web based chats are web based chats. They are not equal to each other.
You can connect to IRC through a browser (like Chatzilla), but IRC is something differenct. Ask in #freenode. That would be the ebst place for this.
